title: Sample Book, 1840s
dimensions: Sample book: 28 W x 32.5 L x 5 H cm
description: Blue cloth bound volume of 574 numbered samples of printed cottons. Title page has three book plates. Book title: "Cotton Prints Samples." Largely small patterns of plaids, florals and stripes of many colors.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1840s.
1840s. Medium: paper, cotton
printed. Gift of Virginia Hamill Johnson. 1973-6-5.
